query:
SELECT 
    SD.SP_PNR,
    SD.AIRLINE_PNR,
    PD.MOBILE_NO,
    PD.FIRST_NAME,
    PD.LAST_NAME,
    LD.DEPT_DATE,
    LD.ARR_DATE,
    LD.FLIGHT_NO,
    LD.AIRLINE_CODE,
    LD.ORIGIN,
    LD.DESTINATION,
    LR.CREATION_TIME,
    LR.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO,
    LR.SUPPLIER_NAME ,
    SC.CREDENTIAL_NAME,
    SC.CREDENTIAL_ID
FROM wonderdb.LOG_REQUESTS_ERROR LR 
INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_SEGMENT_DETAIL SD 
    ON SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = LR.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO
INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_FLIGHTS_LEG_DETAIL LD 
    ON LD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO
INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_PASSENGER_DETAIL PD 
    ON PD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO
    AND PD.LEAD_PASSENGER = 1
INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_INVOICE_DETAIL ID 
    ON ID.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO
INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_SUPPLIER_CREDENTIAL SC 
    ON SC.CREDENTIAL_ID = ID.SEARCH_PCC_ID 
    OR SC.CREDENTIAL_ID = ID.TICKETING_PCC_ID 
WHERE LR.CREATION_TIME BETWEEN '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2025-08-07 00:00:00'
AND LR.SUPPLIER_NAME = 'Galileo'
